DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of KLH-2109 in patients with endometriosis.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Open Label Study of KLH-2109 in Patients With Endometriosis(1)
DOC.criteria: Female patients with endometriosis Patients with clinically significant hepatic, renal, or cardiovascular dysfunction
